import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { Student, YearS } from '../student.model'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { AppStudings, Studying } from '../studing.model'; @Component({ selector: 'single-student-details', templateUrl: './single-student-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./single-student-details.component.scss'] }) export class SingleStudentDetailsComponent { year=YearS; private _student?: Student; studingList:Studying[]=AppStudings; studentForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({}); public get student(): Student | undefined{ return this._student; } @Input() public set student(value: Student | undefined) { this._student = value; if (this._student != undefined) { this.studentForm = new FormGroup({ "id": new FormControl(this._student.id, Validators.required), "name": new FormControl(this._student.name,[Validators.required, Validators.minLength(2)]), "family": new FormControl(this._student.family, [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(2)]), "addres": new FormControl(this._student.addres), "phon": new FormControl(this._student.phon,[ Validators.minLength(9),Validators.maxLength(10)]), "works": new FormControl(this._student.works), "avg": new FormControl(this._student.avg), "dateLeave": new FormControl(this._student.dateLeave), "studying": new FormControl(this._student.studyingId), "year": new FormControl(this._student.year) }); } } ngOnInit(): void { } @Output() onSaveNewStudent: EventEmitter = new EventEmitter(); saveNewStudent() { this.student = this.studentForm.value; console.log("ההוספה בוצעה בהצלחה"); console.log(this.student); this.onSaveNewStudent.emit(this.student); } constructor() { } }
